item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: Amon Amarth, Arch Enemy, Bloodred Hourglass, Dark Tranquillity, Ex Deo, Gyze, Hero'S Fate, Insomnium, Sylvatica, [New] Ensiferum.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 8/2017
item.description: Including: Before The Dawn, Ensiferum, In Mourning, Insomnium, Kalmah, Ne Obliviscaris, Scar Symmetry, Soilwork, The Black Dahlia Murder, Wintersun.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 7/2017
item.description: Including: Amon Amarth, Arch Enemy, At The Gates, Kalmah, Ne Obliviscaris, Noumena, The World Is Yours, Wintersun, [New] Ensiferum, Æther Realm.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 6/2017
item.description: Including: Amon Amarth, Be'Lakor, Dark Tranquillity, Eluveitie, In Flames, Insomnium, Omnium Gatherum, Scar Symmetry, Shylmagoghnar, Soilwork.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 5/2017
item.description: Including: Amorphis, Children Of Bodom, Enshine, Eternal Tears Of Sorrow, Frosttide, In Flames, In Vain, Mors Principium Est, Omnium Gatherum, Wolfheart.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 4/2017
item.description: Including: Aephanemer, Aether Realm, Arsis, Disarmonia Mundi, Dissection, Insomnium, Novembers Doom, Omnium Gatherum, Scary Symmetry, Shylmagoghnar.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 3/2017
item.description: Including: At The Gates, Black Sun Aeon, Dark Tranquillity, Edge Of Sanity, Eluveitie, Insomnium, Nekrogoblikon, Scar Symmetry, Soilwork, Wolfheart.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 2/2017
item.description: Including: Dark Tranquillity, Insomnium, Kalmah, Mors Principium Est, Persefone, Scar Symmetry, Shade Empire, Swallow The Sun, Wolfheart, [8 Bit] Insomnium.

item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 1/2017
item.description: Including: Be'Lakor, Bloodshot Dawn, Buried Realm, Dethklok, Equilibrium, Imperanon, In Mourning, Insomnium, Kalmah, Machine Head.
